seoDescription: International Blockchain Olympiad is a multidisciplinary design and building competition. IBCOL 2019 invites students from around the world to solve real-world challenges through decentralised applications.
mainHeading: Help bring the world onto the Blockchain

leftBlock.title: Not a typical hackathon
leftBlock.infoList:
• Insufficient time to design complete solutions
  • Either too tech-focused or unrealistic
  • No incentive to continue development

rightBlock.title: Build for the real world
rightBlock.infoList:
• Sufficient time to design complete solutions
  • Multidisciplinary approach to applications
  • Matching with investors & incubators

block1.title: Registration
block1.details: Register here before June 9; see: Eligibility

block2.title: Whitepaper
block2.details: Rolling deadline until June 9; see: WP Tips

block3.title: Interview
block3.details: All interviews to be finished before June 9

section01.writtenLanguages: Arabic (standard), Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), English, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Ukrainian
section01.spokenLanguages: Arabic (Egypt), Arabic (Gulf), Cantonese, English, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Mandarin, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Ukrainian

gold.title: Gold Medals
gold.description: 1st place winner of a category with 4096 USD prize

silver.title: Silver Medals
silver.description: 2nd place winner of a category with 2048 USD prize

bronze.title: Bronze Medals
bronze.description: 3rd place winner of a category with 1024 USD prize

nominee.title: Nominator Awards
nominee.description: Recognition of team coach for nominating a winning team

finalist.title: Finalist Awards
finalist.description: Recognition of teams for being top 5 in a category

merit.title: Merit Awards
merit.description: Recognition of teams for designing a complete solution

awards.note: The best prize for students is not financial, but rather experience, guidance, and a chance to make a real impact in the real world.
